sentences.en: A prodigal who returns is more precious than gold.
a statue covered with precious jewels
Actors, he decided, were too precious and neurotic.
sentences.cn: 他认定演员们太做作，并且都神经兮兮的。

sentences.en: Be careful of the material; it's too precious to waste.
sentences.cn: 仔细这些材料, 它太不易搞到,不可浪费.

sentences.en: He showed all his precious pictures to his friends.
sentences.cn: 他把自己所有的珍贵图画都拿出来给朋友们看.

sentences.en: I feel unworthy of the precious gift you have bestowed on me.
Luckily our precious records were saved from the fire.
sentences.cn: 幸运地,我们这些珍贵的记录从火灾中抢救了出来.
我们星球上的宝贵资源

sentences.en: planes delivering precious supplies of medicine and food
sentences.cn: 运送药品、食品等宝贵物资的飞机

sentences.en: police still know precious little about the dead man.
sentences.cn: 警察对那死去的男子仍然所知无几。

sentences.en: Precious few homebuyers will notice any reduction in their monthly repayments.
sentences.cn: 极少数购房者会注意到他们月还款额的减少。

sentences.en: The banks have had precious little to celebrate recently.
sentences.cn: 银行最近没几件值得庆贺的事。

sentences.en: The crown was set with precious jewels—diamonds, rubies and emeralds.
sentences.cn: 王冠上镶嵌着稀世珍宝—有钻石、红宝石、绿宝石。

sentences.en: Theismann's precious information came at a price, however.
sentences.cn: 不过，泰斯曼付出了代价才得到这些宝贵的信息。

sentences.en: There was precious little about the cricket to animate the crowd.
sentences.cn: 板球比赛能激起观众热情的地方很少。

sentences.en: These are precious jewels beyond compare.
sentences.cn: 这些是无与伦比的珍宝.

sentences.en: Water is becoming an increasingly precious resource.
sentences.cn: 水正成为日益珍贵的资源。

sentences.en: You don't care about anything but yourself and your precious face.
sentences.cn: 你什么都不关心，除了你自己和你那张娇贵的脸。

words.tran_cn: 昂贵地；仔细地；过分讲究地

trans.tran_cn: 宝贵的，珍奇的，值得珍视的，宝贝似的，矫揉造作的
trans.tran_en: something that is precious is valuable and important and should not be wasted or used without care

trans.tran_cn: (Precious)人名；(英)普雷舍斯，普雷舍丝(女名)
